text: George Richard Beymer, Jr.Breymer profile, FilmReference.com; accessed 27 June 2014. (born February 20, 1938) is an American actor, filmmaker and artist. He is best known for playing the roles of Tony in the movie version of West Side Story (1961), Peter in The Diary of Anne Frank (1959) and Ben Horne on the television series Twin Peaks (1990â€“1991, 2017). ==References== Category:1938 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American painters Category:American novelists Category:American sculptors Category:Living people Category:Actors from Iowa Category:Writers from Iowa
